name: YouGottaCall
tag_list: word-of-mouth, social-network, local-search, local-social-search, not-for-profit, non-profit
overview:
YouGottaCall.com is the word-of-mouth Connection Engine. It connects members so they can find and share word-of-mouth referrals among their network of trusted friends and neighbors. Each referral can benefit the members’ favorite charitable organization.

Beta testing began in March 2008. An enhanced UI was introduced in 2010 featuring Facebook integration, improved navigation and imported business listings. Hundreds of Connecticut, USA consumers are now connected to their trusted businesses via YouGottaCall.

Operations are planned to expand regionally. YouGottaCall.com, LLC has been awarded a US Patent (No 7,953,644) on key aspects of its business model that allow members, vendors and not-for-profit organizations to connect, bid for referrals, share referral information, and distribute fees to allow ‘not-for-profits’ to benefit.
